A powerful, lightweight light machine gun, perfect for laying down suppressive fire. Its high rate of fire and durable construction make it a reliable choice for anyone needing to handle large groups of hostiles. With a modular design that allows for customization, the RPK-16 offers both accuracy and mobility, ensuring you can dominate the battlefield while maintaining control in intense firefights. Ideal for sustained engagements, it’s a versatile tool for survival.
